verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [V: said] [ARG1: he was " thinking " about issuing a posthumous pardon to the late boxing sensation Muhammad Ali] .
President Donald Trump on Friday said he [V: was] " thinking " about issuing a posthumous pardon to the late boxing sensation Muhammad Ali .
President Donald Trump on Friday said [ARG0: he] was " [V: thinking] " [ARG1: about issuing a posthumous pardon to the late boxing sensation Muhammad Ali] .
President Donald Trump on Friday said [ARG0: he] was " thinking " about [V: issuing] [ARG1: a posthumous pardon] [ARG2: to the late boxing sensation Muhammad Ali] .
